Information.notes: Directions on how to submit this type of request. With additional links to external sources
Information.value:
This form cannot be used to initiate in-year parenting/segmentation requests. If you need to create a new in-year parenting/segmentation request:
To initiate a parenting/segmentation request for SMC-C please go to MicrosoftAmericasRevexSupport
For EC or HSPI: reserarch questions can be submitted through MicrosoftAmericasRevexSupport, or managers should submit new requests directly into the Microsoft Americas BSO Account Management tool (AM Tool). Use this form if you have a segmentation question that you cannot address through the tool.

Information.dependencies: Type of Request = Account Management tool Access
Information.notes: Directions on how to submit this type of request. With additional links to external sources
Information.value: Use this form to request assistance on Microsoft Americas BSO Account Management tool related tools. If you do not see the tool listed that you are looking for help on, use a different Help Category. For SPM access: by default, everyone connected to corpnet has read access to SPM. To request additional access to SPM reporting, utilize the link on the SPM Reports page .

Type of change required.note: Field is visible for only "Change the EDU POD or SMB Managed Flag"

Note.dependencies: Type of Request = CRM ID or Account Attribute Updates AND What kind of issue are you facing? = Change the EDU POD or SMB Managed Flag
Note.value: Please keep in mind that these changes can have both a quota/comp and assignment impact and you should be sure to consider that potential impact before requesting a change. You may update multiple accounts at once, but they must all be the same Tag values. If you need to update multiple accounts to multiple tag values, please submit multiple forms.
Note.note: Field is visible for only "Change the EDU POD or SMB Managed Flag"

You may update multiple accounts at once, but they must all be the same Tag values. If you need to update multiple accounts to multiple tag values, please submit multiple forms.
